text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Duiven | settlement_type = Municipality | image_skyline = Duiven panorama.JPG | image_alt = | image_caption = Duiven town centre | image_flag = Flag of Duiven.svg | flag_size = 100x67px | flag_alt = | image_shield = Coat of arms of Duiven.svg | shield_size = 100x80px | shield_alt = | image_map = Map - NL - Municipality code 0226 (2009).svg | map_alt = Highlighted position of Duiven in a municipal map of Gelderland | map_caption = Location in Gelderland | coordinates = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Netherlands | subdivision_type1 = Province | subdivision_name1 = Gelderland | government_footnotes = | governing_body = Municipal council | leader_party = (VVD) | leader_title = Mayor | leader_name = Huub Hieltjes | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 10 | elevation_max_footnotes = | elevation_max_m = | elevation_min_footnotes = | elevation_min_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = | population_as_of = | population_density_km2 = | population_demonym = | timezone = CET | utc_offset = +1 | timezone_DST = CEST | utc_offset_DST = +2 | postal_code_type = Postcode | postal_code = 6920–6924 | area_code_type = Area code | area_code = 0316 | website = | footnotes = }} Duiven () is a municipality and a town in the eastern Netherlands. Duiven's name can be translated into English to mean "pigeons" or "doves". Although the coat of arms and logo of the municipality feature pigeons, the name is etymologically related to "dunes" (Dutch: duinen). The flag of the municipality of Duiven was granted and adopted on 25 June 1954. == Population centres == Villages: * Duiven * Groessen * Loo Hamlets: * De Eng * Helhoek * Nieuwgraaf ===Topography=== 475px| Dutch Topographic map of the municipality of Duiven, June 2015 ==Transportation== *Duiven railway station is served by trains from Arnhem to Doetinchem and Winterswijk. On weekdays there are 4 trains per hour between Arnhem and Doetinchem, with two of these continuing to Winterswijk. On weekends there are 2 trains per hour between Arnhem and Winterswijk. == Notable people == * Dean Koolhof (born 1994) a Dutch professional footballer, with over 100 club caps, plays for Helmond Sport == Twin towns == Duiven is twinned with: {| class="wikitable" |- valign="top" | * Calafat, Romania || * Gemünden am Main, Bavaria, Germany |} == Gallery == File:Busy shopping at Duiven Plaza Intratuin at friday 27 December 2013 - panoramio.jpg|Duiven Plaza Intratuin File:Duiven, zicht op winkelcentrum De Passage vanaf het brugje bij IKC Remigius IMG 9001 2019-04-01 14.09.jpg|Duiven, view of De Passage shopping centre, from the bridge next to IKC Remigius File:Loowaerd-Loo (22).JPG|Loowaerd, Loo File:The ugly rubbish incineration plant at Westervoort - panoramio.jpg|Rubbish incineration plant at Westervoort ==References== ==External links== * *Official website Category:Municipalities of Gelderland Category:Populated places in Gelderland
title: Duiven
